content.rendered:
Understanding Fault For Your Vehicle Rollover Accident

Rollover accidents aren’t always the fault of careless drivers. They could be caused by poor vehicle design or even inadequate road design.

Determining the ultimate cause of your rollover accident will help you establish where you should look for compensation. Getting a personal injury attorney with experience in such matters is crucial.

The Importance Of Conducting A Thorough Investigation

After a car or truck rollover accident, your personal injury attorney will want to evaluate the circumstances extensively, including road conditions, whether the driver swerved or went too fast around a curve, and the crashworthiness and safety record of the vehicle involved will all be examined.

A Law Firm With Expertise, Skill And Resources

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, our lawyers have handled many of these and other types of auto accident cases for injured parties in Columbus and throughout central Ohio. We have the resources to conduct a thorough investigation immediately to determine the cause of the accident and parties responsible.

If you or a loved one has suffered a broken bone, head injury or spinal cord injury in a rollover accident, let us help.

We are confident that our team has the skill, expertise and track record of success to give you the best chance at securing the compensation you need and deserve.

Free Consultations

To schedule a free initial consultation with one of our Columbus car accident lawyers, call 614-360-2706 or simply contact us online.

Contingency Fee Arrangements

We handle rollover accidents on a contingency basis. This means that our firm will collect attorneys’ fees only if we recover compensation for you.
